name: Gilles Deleuze
main_interests: Aesthetics, history of Western philosophy, metaphilosophy, metaphysics
influences: Henri Bergson, Friedrich Nietzsche, Baruch Spinoza, Gottfried Leibniz, David Hume, Immanuel Kant
influenced: Michel Foucault, Pierre Klossowski, Jean-Jacques Lecercle, Brian Massumi, Félix Guattari, Peter Hallward, John Protevi, Michael Hardt, Antonio Negri, Manuel DeLanda
